hints.content:
When multiplying by $10$, we shift our numbers $1$ place value to the left.

Number | Ten Thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: 
$2{,}700$| |$\swarrow\maroonD{2}$ | $\swarrow\blueD{7}$ | $\swarrow\greenD{0}$ | $\swarrow\purpleD{0}$  
$10 \times 2{,}700$ | $?$ | $?$ |$?$ | $?$ | $?$

Number | Ten Thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: 
$2{,}700$| |$\swarrow\maroonD{2}$ | $\swarrow\blueD{7}$ | $\swarrow\greenD{0}$ | $\swarrow\purpleD{0}$  
$10 \times 2{,}700$ | $\maroonD{2}$ | $\blueD{7}$ |$\greenD{0}$ | $\purpleD{0}$ | $0$
